title: Major road blocked both ways after crash
text:
Major road blocked both ways after crash Sorry, an error occurred. Alanjwest1 6:08pm Wed 21 Oct 15 
Yet another serious accident on this junction and more lives blighted due to the failure of the local authority to do something positive. Yet another serious accident on this junction and more lives blighted due to the failure of the local authority to do something positive. Alanjwest1
